summary: This document is an email chain from June 15, 2022, forwarding a message from an individual claiming to be a victim of Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein. The victim alleges long-term sexual targeting, grooming, career destruction, and threats to their life, and offers to submit evidence connecting crimes to multiple countries.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as a perpetrator alongside Jeffrey Epstein; the victim alleges direct targeting and grooming by Maxwell.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as a perpetrator alongside Ghislaine Maxwell; the victim connects crimes to Epstein.

connections.description: Both are named together by the victim as perpetrators in the same case of sexual abuse rings and grooming.

events.title: Victim's Email to Authorities
events.description: An individual sends an email claiming to be a victim of Maxwell and Epstein, detailing long-term abuse and offering evidence.

keyFacts: An individual claims to have been a targeted victim of Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein since age 14.
The victim alleges a 30-year campaign involving sexual targeting, grooming, career destruction, fraudulent activity, money laundering, and conspired attempts on their life.
The victim states they have been denied investigations and assistance for 9 years.
The victim offers to submit documented evidence connecting the crimes to America, Australia, France, Russia, and the commonwealth.
The victim claims to be in hiding at their parents' house and still under threat.
